tables.table_title: Range of values of the estimated parameters obtained by UMDAc (Alg 3), UMDAc + Local Strategy (Alg 4), Local Strategy (Alg 5), and Random-Search (Alg 6) for the state space model (9)-(11). The range of values is defined by the minimum and maximum values of the estimated parameters in 100 executions of Algorithms.
